channel.title: Main Class Errors
channel.description:
Hey, I move my .CLASS files into a folder I made called Classes. I made the compiler so it will compile them there. But when I run the server I get this error.
SOURCE: [code=java]Not enough storage is available to process this command. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
CLIENT: [code=java]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I've also got an error for an 'Orphaned Case' I have no idea on what is.
[code=java]client.java:7564: orphaned case case 17: ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Main Class Errors
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

I did but now I have an orphaned case for case 21…

RandQm:

/classes.*java

My Server runner looks like this name

@echo off title RUNNER Java Xmx800M Server ./Classes*.java pause

Still doesnt work.

BUMP

Read full topic

item.title: Main Class Errors
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“New Legacy, post:4, topic:425292”][quote author=gara494 link=topic=527954.msg3849373#msg3849373 date=1323899584]
you have to change the run bat location as well
[/quote]
How do I do that? Like what do I change it to?[/quote]

/classes.*java

Read full topic

item.title: Main Class Errors
item.dc:creator: @wildwildwest wildwildwest
item.description:
@wildwildwest wrote:

[quote=“New Legacy, post:4, topic:425292”][quote author=gara494 link=topic=527954.msg3849373#msg3849373 date=1323899584]
you have to change the run bat location as well
[/quote]
How do I do that? Like what do I change it to?[/quote]

Put it under a switch…

Example
switch (stats) {

Put that case under a switch
and were you messing with something?

Read full topic

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

orphaned case means that the case is not under a switch.

item.title: Main Class Errors
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

Hey, I move my .CLASS files into a folder I made called Classes. I made the compiler so it will compile them there. But when I run the server I get this error.

SOURCE:

Not enough storage is available to process this command. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

CLIENT:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

I’ve also got an error for an ‘Orphaned Case’ I have no idea on what is.

client.java:7564: orphaned case case 17: ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
